Article.Abstract: ICC-1132, a recombinant virus-like particle comprising of a modified hepatitis B core protein with a B cell (NANP) and two T cell epitopes of Plasmodium falciparum circumsporozoite protein (CSP), was administered i.m. as a single 50 microg dose in Seppic ISA 720 to 11 volunteers. Local reactogenicity and systemic side effects were acceptable with the predominant finding being mild pain at the injection site. This regimen induced anti-NANP antibodies in 10/11 and modest T cell responses. There was no evidence of protection from experimental challenge with P. falciparum sporozoites. Other formulations and/or multi-dose regimens will be required to enhance the immunogenicity and efficacy of ICC-1132.
Article.ArticleTitle: Safety, immunogenicity and efficacy of a pre-erythrocytic malaria candidate vaccine, ICC-1132 formulated in Seppic ISA 720.
Article.Affiliations: Nuffield Department of Clinical Medicine, Centre for Clinical Vaccinology and Tropical Medicine, Oxford University, Old Road, Headington, Oxford OX3 7LJ, UK. Michael.walther@ndm.ox.ac.uk.
Article.ArticleMeshHeadingsList: Adult; Amino Acid Sequence; Animals; Epitopes, T-Lymphocyte(administration & dosage; immunology); Erythrocytes(immunology; parasitology); Female; Hepatitis B virus(genetics; immunology); Humans; Malaria Vaccines(administration & dosage; adverse effects; genetics; immunology); Malaria, Falciparum(immunology; parasitology; prevention & control); Male; Plasmodium falciparum(immunology); Sporozoites(immunology)

FirstInVivoProcess.DoseSchedule: 1 dose of 50 µg of the vaccine.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: ICC-1132 vaccine is a virus-like particle comprising a recombinant hepatitis B core protein into which the epitope, T1 epitope and Universal T cell epitope (EYLNKIQNSLSTEWSPCSVT) of P. falciparum CSP derived from the NF 54 strain were inserted.

AssayInformation.AssayComments: Following vaccination with ICC-1132, anti-NANP IgG antibodies was detected in all vaccinated volunteers at least for one time point ( from days 14 to 168).

FirstInVivoProcess.InVivoProcessType: Administration in vivo to prevent or reduce disease
FirstInVivoProcess.DoseSchedule: 1 dose of 50 µg of the vaccine.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: ICC-1132 vaccine is a virus-like particle comprising a recombinant hepatitis B core protein into which the epitope, T1 epitope and Universal T cell epitope (EYLNKIQNSLSTEWSPCSVT) of P. falciparum CSP derived from the NF 54 strain were inserted.

AssayInformation.AssayComments: ICC-1132 vaccine including this epitope did not protect healthy human from infecting P. falciparum as measured by the mean time to onset of parasitaemia and parasites number tested by PCR.

FirstInVivoProcess.DoseSchedule: 1 dose of 50 µg of the vaccine.

Immunization.ImmunizationComments: ICC-1132 vaccine is a virus-like particle comprising a recombinant hepatitis B core protein into which the epitope, three NANP repeats B cell epitope and Universal T cell epitope (EYLNKIQNSLSTEWSPCSVT) of P. falciparum CSP derived from the NF 54 strain were inserted.
